mapper.update: update quan_account_future_asset set account_future_id = #{accountFutureId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, coin = #{coin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, right = #{right,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ts = #{ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, data_update = #{dataUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, account_future_id, coin, right, ts, data_update from quan_account_future_asset
